channel.title: GitHub Vue Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Vue in GitHub

item.title: pipipi-pikachu/PPTist
item.description: PowerPoint-ist（/'pauəpɔintist/）, An online presentation application that replicates most of the commonly used features of MS PowerPoint, allowing for the editing and presentation of PPT online. Support AIPPT.

item.title: Gzh0821/pvzg_site
item.description: PvZ2 Gardendless Official Website | A rewritten Plants vs Zombies 2 PC port

item.title: imsyy/SPlayer
item.description: 🎉 一个简约的音乐播放器，支持逐字歌词，下载歌曲，展示评论区，音乐云盘及歌单管理，音乐频谱，移动端基础适配 | 网易云音乐 | A minimalist music player

item.title: pure-admin/vue-pure-admin
item.description: 全面ESM+Vue3+Vite+Element-Plus+TypeScript编写的一款后台管理系统（兼容移动端）

item.title: nuxt-ui-templates/dashboard
item.description: Nuxt Dashboard Template made with Nuxt UI.

item.title: nuxt/ui
item.description: The Intuitive Vue UI Library powered by Reka UI & Tailwind CSS.

item.title: YunYouJun/cook
item.description: 🍲 好的，今天我们来做菜！OK, Let's Cook!

item.title: vbenjs/vue-vben-admin
item.description: A modern vue admin panel built with Vue3, Shadcn UI, Vite, TypeScript, and Monorepo. It's fast!

item.title: Daymychen/art-design-pro
item.description: A Vue 3 admin dashboard template using Vite + TypeScript + Element Plus | vue3 admin | vue-admin — focused on user experience and visual design.

item.title: jekip/naive-ui-admin
item.description: Naive Ui Admin 是一款基于 Vue3、Vite3 和 TypeScript 的先进中后台解决方案，集成了前沿的前端技术栈和典型业务模型。它拥有二次封装组件、动态菜单、权限校验、粒子化权限控制等核心功能，旨在帮助企业快速构建高质量的中后台项目。无论在新技术运用或业务实践层面，都能为您提供有力支持，并将持续更新，以满足您不断变化的需求

item.title: OpenCSGs/csghub
item.description: CSGHub is a brand-new open-source platform for managing LLMs, developed by the OpenCSG team. It offers both open-source and on-premise/SaaS solutions, with features comparable to Hugging Face. Gain full control over the lifecycle of LLMs, datasets, and agents, with Python SDK compatibility with Hugging Face. Join us! ⭐️

item.title: yangzongzhuan/RuoYi-Vue3
item.description: 🎉 (RuoYi)官方仓库 基于SpringBoot，Spring Security，JWT，Vue3 & Vite、Element Plus 的前后端分离权限管理系统

item.title: crmeb/CRMEB
item.description: 🔥CRMEB开源商城免费开源多语言商城系统，Tp6框架商城，系统可商用；包含小程序商城、H5商城、公众号商城、PC商城、App，支持分销、拼团、砍价、秒杀、优惠券、积分、会员等级、小程序直播、页面DIY，前后端分离，方便二开，更有详细使用文档、接口文档、数据字典、二开文档/视频教程，欢迎大家提出宝贵意见和建议

item.title: zyronon/TypeWords
item.description: 练习英语，一次敲击，一点进步；Practice English, One Keystroke at a Time.

item.title: VueTorrent/VueTorrent
item.description: The sleekest looking WEBUI for qBittorrent made with Vuejs!
